diff_act: 3.provide information on the reason for the failure

regen.absent_element: distinction between busy line and network issues in call failure indications
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide distinct audible and visual indications to the driver for busy line and network issues when a call connection is unsuccessful.

regen.absent_element: specific indication of busy line or network issues
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide specific audible and visual indications to the driver in case of a busy line or network issues, distinguishing between these two scenarios.

regen.absent_element: indication of busy line or network issues
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if the call is unsuccessful due to a busy line or network issues.

label: This shall also indicate if the called party was busy or if the network could not connect the call.
absence: specific indication of unsuccessful connect: busy or network error
